headline: APTIV HLDS LTD (APTV) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for APTIV HLDS LTD (APTV) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?
